DOC.brief_summary: To assess Pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics single dos ASP1517 renal anemia patient hemodialysis . Safety tolerability also evaluate patient .
DOC.brief_title: ASP1517 Pharmacokinetics Study Anemia Patients Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Chronic renal failure patient receive hemodialysis thrice weekly Body weight : > =40.0 < 80.0 kg Mean hemoglobin level > =10.0 = < 12.0 g/dL Patients severe inflammation infection Patients medical history gastrointestinal surgery enterectomy Patients uncontrolled hypertension Patients whose AST , ALT , total bilirubin , GGT exceed ULN medical history serious liver diseases Patients medical history severe cardiac cerebrovascular diseases Patients receive blood transfusion surgery ( except surgery shunt ) within 4 week Patients medical history serious drug allergy Patients may pregnant lactating , refuse use require birth control study period
